error.cue1: The email address is required and and can't be empty.
error.cue3: The password is required and and can't be empty.
error.cue4: Passwords must be at least 8-20 characters with 1 capital letter and 1 number.

modules1.title: Bitcoin Booms: A One of a Kind Legend
modules1.subtitle: After its mysterious launch in 2009, Bitcoin has once surged more than 5 million times and rose nearly twenty times from 16 to 17.

modules2.title: More and more successful enterprises included Bitcoin as one of their payment methods.
modules2.subtitle: BitCoin is acknowledged by more than 100 thousand companies.

modules3.title: What is PARK.ONE?
modules3.content: PARK.ONE is a virtual currency exchange where our global clients trade wide variety of cryptocurrencies and digital tokens.  With our international operating team, experienced engineers and professional risk management specialists, PARK.ONE is the go-to platform for traders.  We are setting feet in the industry in more than 50 countries, striving to provide our users with secure, professional and convenient service.
modules3.contentNext: Locating its main operation center in Japan, PARK.ONE offers a great variety of services including funding, exchange, investment banking and B20.  Well-established as it is, PARK.ONE is strategically invested by ValueBank, a top-notch corporate in the industry.

modules4.title: Why PARK.ONE?
modules4.li1C: Enables hot and cold wallet, safe and multi-signature to secure your fund
modules4.li2C: Upholds stringent ICO process and strict identity verification, at par with financial institutions
modules4.li3C: Simple operation and real-time transactions.  Lightning withdraw and deposit speed
